actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) necrotic.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the moldering devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Field Hopper
special_abilities.desc: The moldering devil can fly up to 40' on its turn but it must start and end its movement on a solid surface such as a roof or the ground. If it is flying at the end of its turn it falls to the ground and takes falling damage.

special_abilities.name: Rotting Death
special_abilities.desc: When it dies all foodstuffs water and beverages within 100' of it are subjected to the devil's Touch of Rot trait.

special_abilities.name: Touch of Rot
special_abilities.desc: Any foodstuff water or beverage whether fresh or preserved that comes into contact with the moldering devil immediately decays and becomes inedible or undrinkable. If a creature consumes such food or drink it must make a DC 11 Con save. On a failure it takes 7 (2d6) poison and is poisoned for 24 hrs. On a success it takes half the damage and is poisoned for 1 hr.
